chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: Bael, p. 81 (60)—Clan chief of the Goshien Aiel. He is the tallest man Rand has ever met, almost a head taller than Rand, who is not short. He has deep, resonant voice. He has two wives: Dorindha, and Melaine. Melaine and Bael were recently wed, after Dorindha agreed to accept Melaine as a sister-wife. See also Dorindha; Melaine.
